rows.label: qst701501_msg0001
rows.name:
What luck, a group of youngsters!
I was just looking for someone to run
an errand for me.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm dying, you know. The doctor says
the end is near... Oh, don't be sad! At
my age, death is a peaceful prospect.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0003
rows.name:
I've seen so many of my friends off
already... Now, it's my turn. That's
all there is to it.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0004
rows.name:
All souls will be saved in the end.
That's what the teachings of the
Pope say and that's what I believe.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0005
rows.name:
...Erm, where was I? Ah yes. My one
regret is a promise I once made to a
friend that I haven't kept.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0006
rows.name:
I promised to make a vase, but I don't
have the materials for it. Would you
know where to find them for me?

rows.label: qst701501_msg0007
rows.name:
Here's what I need: two sprigs of Spiral
Mistletoe, four Silverwing Quartz, and
four chunks of Eternity Loam. That's it!

rows.label: qst701501_msg0008
rows.name:
If you happen to find some on your
travels and feel like sharing, I'd be
most grateful.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, about that Eternity Loam.
I seem to remember that you could
harvest it in the Loftin Nature Preserve.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0010
rows.name:
These days it's very valuable, so I feel
like maybe there isn't so much of it left.
Still, it may be worth a look...

rows.label: qst701501_msg0011
rows.name:
No need to go out of your way to get
it all, but, like I said, I'd be grateful for
any help you can offer.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0012
rows.name:
I reckon my friend's forgotten all
about this, heh heh... But a promise
is a promise and I want to keep it.
